Author: Helio#1948
Content: Hi guys, im looking to having a lengthy coversation with an official developer within the community about abilities and limits of the platform could someone DM me with official credentials. Thanks

Author: Razzler04#2552
Content: hello there what is the best way to move all my data files to another location for my Komodo QT client to access?

Author: Razzler04#2552
Content: I can't and don't want 20 G plus worth of data on my windows local user profile, want to move it elsewhere

Author: Oszy#5734
Content: you can move it anywhere, but then you have to start with -datadir=PATH parameter

Author: gcharang#6833
gcharang#6833
Content:
if the new location was "D:\komodo-data",
the parameter to add would be: `-datadir=D:\komodo-data`
